faq_items.title: 1.	Where do I get my user ID?
faq_items.text: Your user ID will be provided to you by your Healthcare Officer.

faq_items.title: 2.	How do I upload the DOTS Therapy video?
faq_items.text: Upload a sample video here â€“

faq_items.title: 3.	Can I cancel my teleconsultation appointment?
faq_items.text: Yes, you may use the Teleconsultation tab for this.

faq_items.title: 4.	What happens if I forget to upload my video?
faq_items.text: Your information will be sent to the Healthcare for further actions.

faq_items.title: 5.	How can I check my track record of uploading the videos?
faq_items.text: Please check My DOTS Therapy progress in your user profile.

faq_items.title: 6.	Who can I speak to regarding this app?
